name: Toro Limitada 2018
additionalNotes:
Created by a german group of aficionados founded on Facebook in 2014. 
The Nordlicht Toro Limitada 2018 is a nicaraguan puro. The wrapper is a Jalapa colorado (maduro) leaf.
The cigar got two binder cross-rolled from Jalapa (1 viso, 1 seco).
The filler is based of one seco and one viso leaf from Jalapa, one ligero from Esteli and one ligero from Condega. The cigar aged 4 years before shipment.
